keywords_explanation_array: "Blades are shaped to generate maximum power from the wind. ","Wind vane is the \"tail\"that keeps the windmill pointed into the wind. ","Gear box increases the shaft speed. ","Generator rotates along with the blades and produces the electricity. ","The tower holds the windmill up into the airflow.","An assembly of rotating blades that supplies lift or stability.Â ","Long cylindrical device that extends from the center of the rotor along its axis.","A turbine having a large vaned wheel rotated by the wind to generate electricity."
